name: Monocykl
description:
Monocykl

Monocykl is a game about keeping the balance while riding a unicycle on the rooftops! It relies on your reflexes and a bit of thinking to achieve this. The word “monocykl” means “unicycle” in Polish.

How to play
  • Use W A S D to tilt the unicycle.
  • W/S also moves you back and forth.
  • If you tilt too much, you will tip over and lose.
  • Each building you reach = 10 points
Credits
  • Everything, excluding the font was made by me.
  • The font can be found here
